abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of this Health System
            Modernization Project for Albania are: (i) to improve the
            capacity of the Ministry of Health (MoH) and Health
            Insurance Institute (HII) to effectively formulate and
            implement health policies and reforms in provider payments,
            monitoring and quality assurance, (ii) to improve both the
            access to, and quality of, primary health care services,
            with an emphasis on those in poor and under-serviced areas,
            and (iii) to improve governance and management in the
            hospital sector. The restructuring is a level two
            restructuring to make the following changes to the project
            being carried out by the Republic of Albania: (i) revision
            and cancellation of certain project activities, and (ii)
            reallocation of credit proceeds. This restructuring is
            expected to aid in the successful completion of all project
            activities before the project closing date.
